articles.title: SpaceX's prototype rocket explodes in giant fireball - Brisbane Times
articles.description: An uncrewed SpaceX prototype rocket exploded on impact after an attempted high-altitude test flight in Texas.
articles.content:
Starship seemed to hit the mark or at least come close. There was no immediate word from SpaceX on how high it went.
